Title: Checking In
Director: Mark Adams, Troy Dennison, Leah Green, Rebecca Harris-Smith, David Hastings, Kaushy Patel
Writer: Mark Adams, Troy Dennison, Leah Green, David Hastings, David Hastings (story), David Hastings, Kaushy Patel, Kaushy Patel (story), Hakam Poselay, Anjana Vincent
Actors: David Claridge, Rushaun Cookhorn, Michelle Cox, Troy Dennison
Plot: In any Hotel, there are stories. Each guest there has one, a past, a conflict, as well as hope. Set in a hotel over the course of 24 hours, 'Checking In', tells five stories, each allowing ...
